committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative stamp in honor of the 130th anniversary of the death of Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo.

summary.text: Provides for the issuance of a commemorative stamp in honor of the one hundred thirtieth anniversary of the death of Juan Rodriquez Cabrillo.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative stamp in honor of the 130th anniversary of the death of Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo.
